thread.title: Karina
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Karina

author: Karina
title: Karina
text:
Dear Jackie:
Thank you for your kindness and understanding at life's lowest moments. Never imagined I would need help with my credit debt. You took the stress away, and re-assured me, that all would be okay. I am now working at re-building my life. Thanks again for being so considerate and compasionate.
